pli-tv-pvr3:2.4: This renders tesaṁ sabhāgadhammānaṁ. The point seems to be that the names anicca, etc., mentioned above, are not even known if a Buddha does nor arise.
pli-tv-pvr3:3.4: Reading sabrahmake as a shorthand for sabrahmake loke.
pli-tv-pvr3:28.4: SP.5.260: Ubhinnaṁ dūtakena cāti “cīvaracetāpannaṁ upakkhaṭaṁ hotī”ti āgatasikkhāpadadvayañca, “Ubhinnaṃ dūtakena ca: and the two rules on ‘has set aside a robe fund’ that are handed down.” In other words, ubhinnaṁ refers to both bhikkhu nissaggiya pācittiya 8 and 9.
